# Simple Small Business Meta

Advanced Custom Fields and WSForm export files to add to the Simple Small Business Listing.

**Contributors:** [topher1kenobe](http://profiles.wordpress.org/topher1kenobe)  
**Tags:** [](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/)  
**Requires at least:**   
**Tested up to:**   
**Stable tag:** 1.0  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

## Description ##

Advanced Custom Fields and WSForm export files to add to the Simple Small Business Listing. The WSForm addon requires the Pro version and the Post Management addon. Using the coupon code STAYINSIDE gets you 20% off.

## Installation ##

1. Use the import functions in both ACF and WSForm
